ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://go.dev/dl/go1.20.12.src.tar.gz
ğŸš echo c5bf934751d31c315c1d0bb5fb02296545fa6d08923566f7a5afec81f2ed27d6  go1.20.12.src.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf go1.20.12.src.tar.gz
ğŸš cd go/src
ğŸš export GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP=/usr
ğŸš ./make.bash
ğŸš unset GOROOT_BOOSTRAP
ğŸš cd ../..
ğŸš sudo chown root:root go
ğŸš sudo mv go go-1.20.12
ğŸš sudo rm -rf /opt/package/go-1.20.12
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/package
ğŸš sudo mv go-1.20.12 /opt/package
ğŸš rm -rf
